page.title: 04Leisure and recreation
page.content: My Sunday On Sunday morning I get up early and play with my brother until Mummy and Daddy get up.Then we have some breakfast together and Daddy takes us swimming.Mummy stays at home and cooks. We meet our friends in the pool and play together.After we come home from swimming we have dinner.My favourite Sunday dinner is Yorkshire pudding with Roast Beef.In the afternoon if it is raining we play games like snooker, board games or computer games in the house.If it is nice weather we go out somewhere,to the river or the park or somewhere interesting.Sometimes we take a picnic with us.After tea we see if there are any children's programmes we like on television.Then my brother and I have a bath and get ready for bed.
